There are homeless people living in the basement of the Smolene dysfunction.

Society♪1 minute ago

" Our house has a great neighbor. " A multi-family house on Popov Street No. 50 has been set up by new " Giants " . People settled in the basement without a place of residence. The information on this immediately went through the social media. They complained about the unpleasant smell and the trash that showed up in the basement together with the non-processed guests.

To share the news.
